price: We did not create the heavens and earth and all that is between them for fun.
arabic: وَمَا خَلَقۡنَا ٱلسَّمَآءَ وَٱلۡأَرۡضَ وَمَا بَيۡنَهُمَا لَٰعِبِينَ

version.title: English Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
